nags.add-description.description.defaultMessage: Oh hai! Needz a gud descripshun 'bout what dis project doez, ya know? Like, what iz it fur and howz it workz? Hoomans needz teh knowz.

nags.add-icon.description.defaultMessage: Gettin' a speshul, amazin', an' funneh icon iz makin' ur projecshun stand out an' be rekernizable, yaaaay.

nags.add-links.description.defaultMessage: Gimme all teh gud linkz! Like, codez, bug reportz, or even a Kittehcord invite.

nags.all-tags-selected.description.defaultMessage: U picked all {totalAvailableTags} tagz! Dat no good – tagz shud help kittehz find da right projects. Plz only pick tagz dat fit ur project.

nags.description-too-short.description.defaultMessage: Oh hai! Ur description is {length} charakters long. Mini-mewm of {minChars} charakters iz recommended, to make itz super clear n' tell evrything.

nags.feature-gallery-image.description.defaultMessage: Oh hai! Da feechurd gallerry pictar iz liek, how ur projec gives da furrst impreshun, ya knowz.

nags.feature-gallery-image.title.defaultMessage: Maek an pictar shiny n’ frontpage

nags.gpl-license-source-required.descrip.defaultMessage: Oh hai! Ur {projectType} uses a kitteh rights dat sez peeps gots ta see teh codez. Gibz us teh codez linkz or files fur evry new vershun, or maybe use diffrent kitteh rights.

nags.image-heavy-description.description.defaultMessage: Ur Descripshun shud haz enuff plain text or alt-text for pictarz, so hoomanz usin’ screen readerz or slow webz can still get da fun.

nags.image-heavy-description.title.defaultMessage: Keep it easy for all kittehz

nags.invalid-license-url.description.dom.defaultMessage: Ur license webz points to {domain}, but dat no good fur license info. License URLz shud go straight to da license file, no social media, game platformz, or other shiny stuffs.

nags.invalid-license-url.description.mal.defaultMessage: Ur license webz lookz all messy. Plz gimme a proper URL to ur license text.

nags.link-shortener-usage.description.defaultMessage: No can haz link-shortenerz or sneaky ways to hide where link goez. Only use full-length shiny linkz for external stuff or licensez, kthx.

nags.long-headers.description.defaultMessage: {count, plural, one {# header} other {# headers}} in ur descripshun {count, plural, one {is} other {are}} too long. Headerz shud be short n’ snappy, actin’ like section titlez, not full sentences.

nags.minecraft-title-clause.description.defaultMessage: Projectz shud not use Minecwaft brandy-stuff or put ‘Minecwaft’ big in da name.

nags.missing-alt-text.description.defaultMessage: Sum of ur pictarz missin’ alt-text, and dat iz impawtant fur hoomanz usin’ screen readerz or wit slow webz.

nags.misused-discord-link-description.defaultMessage: No can haz Discord invitez for other link typez. Gib me ur Kittehcord link only in da Discord Invite link box, kthx.

nags.moderator-feedback.description.defaultMessage: Peek at all da mod kittehz concerns n’ fix dem before sendin’ it bakk, kthx.

nags.multiple-resolution-tags.descriptio.defaultMessage: U picked {count} resolution tagz ({tags}). Resource packz shud usually only haz one tag dat matchz their main resolution.

nags.select-environments.description.defaultMessage: Pickz da enviroz ur {projectType} wurks on.

nags.select-license.description.defaultMessage: Pick da license dat ur {projectType} sharin’ undr.

nags.select-tags.description.defaultMessage: Pick da tagz dat fit ur project so da rite kittehz can find it.

nags.settings.environments.title.defaultMessage: Visit teh where da pawject workz tweakz

nags.summary-same-as-title.description.defaultMessage: Ur summary no can be da same as ur project Name. Make a fun n’ info-y Summary dat kittehz wanna read.

nags.summary-same-as-title.title.defaultMessage: Give ur summary its own shiny style

nags.summary-special-formatting.descript.defaultMessage: Ur summary shud no haz fancy format, line breaks, special charz, or linkz, cuz it only shows plain text.

nags.summary-too-short.description.defaultMessage: Ur summary iz {length} characturz. At least {minChars} characturz recommended to make a fun n’ info-y summary.

nags.title-contains-technical-info.descr.defaultMessage: Keep ur project Name clean n’ snappy so kittehz can find it easy! Verzhun n’ loader info shows up automatically next to ur project.

nags.too-many-tags.description.defaultMessage: U picked {tagCount} tagz. Try usin’ {maxTagCount} or fewer so kittehz can find ur project in search.

nags.upload-gallery-image.description.defaultMessage: U need at least one gallery pictar to show off da content of ur {type}{resourcepackMessage}.

nags.upload-gallery-image.title.defaultMessage: Plop n’ a pictar to gallery

nags.upload-version.description.defaultMessage: U need at least one verzhun before ur project can go for kitteh check.

nags.verify-external-links.description.defaultMessage: Sum of ur external linkz might be usin’ domains dat no fit dat type of link, oops.
